Name: Birch Bark
Description: Can be processed into an extract to make a spicy, herbal beverage.

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 추출물로 허브 음료를 만들 수 있다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Kann zu einem Extrakt verarbeitet werden, um ein würziges Kräutergetränk herzustellen.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 桦树皮提取物可以被制成辛辣的药饮。
